meanings.definition: A marked path for pedestrians to cross a street.
meanings.sent1: The children waited at the crosswalks before crossing the busy road.
meanings.sent2: It is important to always use crosswalks when crossing the street for safety.
meanings.sent3: The ducklings lined up at the crosswalks, waiting for their turn to waddle across.
meanings.sent4: The crosswalks acted as a bridge connecting the two sides of the street.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow paint on the crosswalks made them easily visible to drivers.

meanings.definition: To walk across a street at a designated crossing point.
meanings.sent1: She carefully crosswalks the street while holding her mother's hand.
meanings.sent2: Remember to always crosswalks at the traffic light to stay safe.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to crosswalks the road right in front of the slow-moving car.
meanings.sent4: He crosswalks the street like a pro, confidently navigating the traffic.
meanings.sent5: Crosswalks quickly before the light changes to avoid any oncoming cars.
